modules.name: Basics of Python Programming
modules.description: Basic Python covers variables, data types, loops, functions, and I/O.
modules.project: Create a basic calculator with conditional operations.

modules.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
modules.description: DSA focuses on efficient data storage and problem-solving methods.
modules.project: Develop a to-do list application with priority sorting.

modules.name: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
modules.description: OOP is a programming style based on classes and objects.
modules.project: Create a library management system using OOP principles.

modules.name: File Handling and Exceptions
modules.description: File handling manages data files; exceptions handle runtime errors.
modules.project: Build a file organizer that categorizes files into folders based on type.

modules.name: Advanced Python
modules.description: Advanced Python includes decorators, generators, and context managers.
modules.project: Design a multithreaded web scraper for extracting headlines.

modules.name: Introduction to Machine Learning
modules.description: Getting started with algorithms that enable data-driven predictions.
modules.project: Implement a simple house price prediction model.

modules.name: Supervised Learning
modules.description: Learning from labeled data to predict outcomes.
modules.project: Develop a spam email detection system.

modules.name: Unsupervised Learning
modules.description: Identifying patterns in unlabeled data.
modules.project: Create a customer segmentation model for a retail store.

modules.name: Model Evaluation and Optimization
modules.description: Enhancing model performance through evaluation and fine-tuning.
modules.project: Optimize a model to predict employee attrition rates.

modules.name: Deployment
modules.description: Delivering models for real-world use.
modules.project: Deploy a loan approval prediction model on a cloud platform.

modules.name: Basics of Neural Networks
modules.description: Basics of neural networks cover layers, neurons, and learning processes.
modules.project: Build a simple neural network for digit classification (MNIST).

modules.name: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
modules.description: CNNs are neural networks specialized for image processing tasks.
modules.project: Create a face detection system using CNNs.

modules.name: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)
modules.description: RNNs are neural networks designed for sequential data and time series.
topics: Applications in Text and Time-Series Data
modules.project: Build a text sentiment analysis tool using RNNs.

modules.name: Transformers
modules.description: Transformers are models that use attention to process sequence data efficiently.
modules.project: Develop a text summarization tool using BERT.

modules.name: Deployment and Real-World Applications
modules.description: Deployment and real-world applications involve launching models for practical use.
modules.project: Deploy an image recognition model on a cloud platform

modules.name: Text Preprocessing
modules.description: Preparing text data for analysis and modeling.
modules.project: Develop a keyword extractor from text documents.

modules.name: Classical NLP Approaches
modules.description: Traditional methods for text analysis using statistical and rule-based techniques.
modules.project: Build a sentiment analysis model for product reviews.

modules.name: Advanced NLP Techniques
modules.description: Cutting-edge methods like transformers for deep text understanding.
modules.project: Create a machine translation system.

modules.name: Applications of NLP
modules.description: Real-world uses of NLP, including chatbots, sentiment analysis, and translation.
modules.project: Develop a chatbot for customer support.

modules.name: Deployment and Integration
modules.description: Implementing models into systems for seamless real-world use.
modules.project: Deploy a language detection model for a multilingual website

modules.name: Fundamentals of Generative AI
modules.description: Exploring models like GANs, VAEs, and Diffusion for generative tasks.
modules.project: Build a basic GAN for image generation.

modules.name: Text Generation
modules.description: Text generation is creating written content using AI models.
modules.project: Develop an AI writer for automated blog generation.

modules.name: Image and Video Generation
modules.description: Image and video generation use AI to create visual content.
modules.project: Create an AI-powered image-to-art converter.

modules.name: Multi-Modal Models
modules.description: Multi-modal models process and combine different data types like text and images.
topics: Combining Text, Image, and Audio Data
modules.project: Develop a multi-modal system that generates captions for images.

modules.name: Real-World Applications and Deployment
modules.description: Real-world applications and deployment bring AI models into practical use.
modules.project: Deploy a generative AI model for creating virtual environments

modules.name: Introduction to LangChain
modules.description: Overview of LangChain for building language model-powered applications.
modules.project: Build a simple conversational chain using LangChain.

modules.name: Working with Language Models
modules.description: Using language models to generate, understand, and analyze text.
modules.project: Create a question-answering system using GPT.

modules.name: Building Knowledge-Based Systems
modules.description: Developing intelligent systems using structured data and rules.

modules.name: Integration with External Services

modules.project: Build a real-time data processing pipeline using LangGraph.

modules.name: Complex Graph Applications

modules.name: Deployment and Monitoring
modules.description: Deployment and monitoring ensure AI models run smoothly and perform well in production.

modules.name: Introduction to MLFlow
modules.description: Getting started with MLflow for tracking and managing ML experiments.

modules.description: MLflow Tracking lets you log and manage experiments with APIs, a central server, metadata store, and artifact storage.

modules.name: MLflow Logging Functions
modules.description: MLflow logging functions record experiment data like parameters, metrics, tags, and artifacts during model training.
topics: Setting and Getting Tracking Uri - Part 1
Setting and Getting Tracking Uri - Part 2
Start and End run functions - Part 1
Start and End run functions - Part 2

modules.name: Launch Multiple Experiments and Runs
modules.description: MLflow allows launching multiple experiments and runs to track and compare different model training workflows.

Launch multiple Experiments in a program

modules.name: Autologging in MLflow
modules.description: MLflow autologging automatically logs parameters, metrics, and artifacts during training.

modules.name: Tracking Server of MLflow
modules.description: The MLflow Tracking Server stores and manages experiment runs, parameters, metrics, and artifacts centrally.

modules.name: MLflow Model Component
modules.description: The MLflow Model component packages machine learning models for easy deployment and reuse across platforms.
topics: What is Signature Enforcement in MLflow
Log Signatures & input example in MLflow

modules.name: Handling Customized Models in MLflow
modules.description: MLflow handles custom models by packaging and logging them with their code and dependencies.

modules.name: MLflow Model Evaluation
modules.description: MLflow Model Evaluation tracks and compares model performance using logged metrics and visualizations.

modules.name: Future of Ethical AI
modules.description: Advancing AI with fairness, transparency, and societal benefit in mind.

modules.name: Excel with Project

modules.name: SQL Server with Project
modules.description: Learn the fundamentals of SQL Server through hands-on projects, covering database design, queries, and performance optimization.
topics: Arithmetic, Comparision, Logical, Set & Special Operators, Schemas
Constraints, Joins, Views, Synonyms, Indexes & Sub Queries
ER Modelling, Relationships, OLTPS, Temporary Tables
TSQL, Variables, Control Statements, Cursors, Stored Procedures, Stored Functions

modules.name: PowerBI with Project
modules.description: Gain hands-on experience in data analysis and visualization by learning Power BI tools and techniques through a practical, real-world project.

Grouping, Binning, Sorting, Tooltip Page & Bookmarks

Dataflows, Dataset actions, Excel Workbooks, Report & Dashboard actions
Row Level Security, Deployment Pipelines, ADD ONs

modules.name: Python with Project
modules.description: Learn Python fundamentals through hands-on coding and build a complete project to apply your skills in a real-world context.

Exception Handling, Regular Expressions, Exporting Data to .txt Files

modules.name: Interview Preparation
modules.description: This module provides essential strategies and practical skills to help you confidently prepare for and succeed in job interviews.
